subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Marek Zidlicky scored the only goal in the shootout and Minnesota benefited from a goal thatPittsburgh put into its own net as the Wild recorded a 2-1 victory.
snippet: Marek Zidlicky scored the only goal in the shootout and Minnesota benefited from a goal thatPittsburgh put into its own net as the Wild recorded a 2-1 victory.
